Loading libraries

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r}
bgg_data <- read_csv2("data/bgg_dataset.csv") |> clean_names()

bgg_data |>
  group_by(domains) |>
  summarise(count=n()) |>
  arrange(desc(count))
```

```{r}
bgg_data |>
  group_by(domains) |>
  summarize(average_rating = mean(rating_average)) |>
  arrange(desc(average_rating))
```
